metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000225 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cobbler version Verified as present in Cobbler versions 2.6.11+, but codeinspection suggests at least 2.0.0+ or possibly even older versions may bevulnerable contains a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability incobbler-web that can result in Privilege escalation to admin.. This attackappear to be exploitable via "network connectivity". Sendingunauthenticated JavaScript payload to the Cobbler XMLRPC API(/cobbler_api).

criterions.comment: cobbler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
